revised_title: Observations on the Harmonics of a String Struck at One-Eighth of its Length
tldr: The author investigates the harmonics of a string struck at one-eighth of its length and provides a detailed analysis of the first 20 harmonics, including their number of vibrations, corresponding notes, and distances from the belly-bridge. The study aims to understand the effect of the striking place on the harmonics and contributes to the understanding of musical acoustics.
